title: AbstractQualityMetric
description: Generic quality metric schema fragment containing the universal properties for data profiling and data metrics of OSDU objects.

RunDateTime.description: Run timestamp of the Business data quality ruleset.

MetadataCountTotal.description: Total number of metadata attributes for object in scope.

MetadataNull.description: The count of total number where metadata is not populated.

MetadataCountFormat.description: Total number of attributes defined in reference value lists.

MetadataFormat.description: The count of total number where attribute follows the defined reference value lists.

MetadataCountPattern.description: Total number of attributes with a pattern.

MetadataPattern.description: The count of total number of attributes that follow pattern.

MetadataCountRequiredTrue.description: The count of required metadata that are not populated.

MetadataAdditionalPropertiesTrue.description: The count of total number of additional properties that are not populated.

MetadataScore.description: The score in % for the evaluated record.
